                                                              int gridXTo,
                                                              int gridZFrom,
                                                              int gridZTo)
        Description copied from interface: HexagonalGrid
        Returns all Hexagons contained in the given axial coordinate range. If the range contains coordinates which are not part of the grid it will throw a HexagonNotFoundException .
        Specified by:
        getHexagonsByAxialRange in interface HexagonalGrid
        Parameters:
        gridXFrom - from x inclusive
        gridXTo - to x inclusive
        gridZFrom - from z inclusive
        gridZTo - to z inclusive
        Returns:
        Hexagons in the given range.

        public Hexagon getByGridCoordinate(int gridX,
                          int gridZ)
        Description copied from interface: HexagonalGrid
        Fetches a Hexagon by its grid coordinate. If no Hexagon found at the given location it throws a HexagonNotFoundException.

        gridZ - grid z coordinate

      • getByPixelCoordinate

        public Hexagon getByPixelCoordinate(double x,
                           double y)
        Description copied from interface: HexagonalGrid
        Returns a Hexagon by a pixel coordinate. Throws HexagonNotFoundException if there were no Hexagon at the given coordinates. Please note that all pixel coordinates are relative to the containing HexagonalGrid.
        Specified by:
        getByPixelCoordinate in interface HexagonalGrid
        Parameters:
        x - pixel x coordinate
        y - pixel y coordinate
        Returns:
        Hexagon
